name: 凯伦·科奈儿

last_movies.title: 维京传奇：英灵神殿 第一季

introduction: 凯伦 科奈儿 于 1987 年出生于爱尔兰都柏林。 她在爱尔兰国立大学攻读戏剧和戏剧研究文学硕士学位。 她参加了核心戏剧学校并获得了契诃夫培训证书。凯伦以短片演员的身份开始了她的职业生涯。 2016年出演Neolithic Patchwork Quilt。同年出演迪伦酒店广告。 2018年出演美国恐怖科幻电视剧《夜行者》后成名。2020年出演历史剧电视剧《维京人》。2021年在电影《真心无爱》中饰演安东内拉。 她的其他项目包括维京人：瓦尔哈拉，维京人的续集。Karen Connell was born in 1987 in Dublin, Ireland. She studied Master of Arts degree in Drama and Theatre Studies from the National University of Ireland. She attended Core Theatre School and earned a Certificate in Chekhov Training.Karen started her career as an actor with short films. She acted in Neolithic Patchwork Quilt in 2016. The same year she appeared in Dylan Hotel Commercial. Karen rose to fame after appearing in the American horror science fiction television series Nightflyers in 2018. She acted in a historical drama tv series Vikings in 2020. She played the role of Antonella in the 2021 film I'm Not In Love. Her other projects include Vikings: Valhalla, a sequel of Vikings.
